title: Malzahar's Voidlings die when Malzahar Dies. [GAMEPLAY]
body:
Whenever Malzahar is killed, his voidlings instantly die.
This is really a game bug because it is inconsistent with all other "creatures" from other champs.
For example: When Annie dies, her Tibbers lasts the full length of time.
Same with yoricks , they are still alive doing their thing until their timer or HP depletes...

Step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce the issue. Spawn voidlings, then allow Malz to die. You will see his voidlings disappear instantly 100% of the time.

This should not be how Malz's voidling act... they should last the full duration after he dies.

replies.body:
....That's how it's intended to work.

The skill is working correctly.
